Quarto is…

 

An open-source publishing suite

Leveraged by multiple coding languages

  • Python, R, Julia, ObservableJS

Supported by multiple IDEs

  • VS Code, Jupyter, RStudio, Neovim

Publish to multiple hosting targets

  • QuartoPub | GitHub Pages | Posit Connect | Netlify | Others

A useful addition to your reproducible workflow

 

Website & slides

Website and slides were developed via the Quarto suite and published to Quarto.pub
